document.full_text: al qaeda in the islamic maghreb (aqim) denied saturday it was involved in a bomb attack on a cafe in marrakesh last week that killed 17 people including eight french nationals.
document.title: qaeda denies involvement in morocco cafe bomb attack
lines_and_colors: al qaeda in the islamic maghreb (aqim) denied saturday it was involved in a bomb attack on a cafe in marrakesh last week that killed 17 people including eight french nationals.
